medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent right upper quadrant (RUQ) and epigastric abdominal pain worsening with food.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced intermittent RUQ and epigastric abdominal pain for about 1 month, which worsened with food. Pain became constant 5 days prior to admission, leading to presentation at another facility.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Migraines, Uterine fibroids, Abnormal pap smears.
